resources:
RoseBotTablet'
If you go here you find fantasy books. If you go here you find sci-fi books. The red marker on the map shows your location in the store. Hi, my name is Rose Bot. You can ask me where the different book categories are or press the ready button. What books are you looking for? It was a great pleasure to help. Now I am going back to sleep. Sorry I didn\'t understand, can you ask again? Sorry, I don\'t understand you. You can also press the ready button, or click on me and try asking again. Thanks for asking. I am fine. How are you? Great to hear you are fine. How can I help you? Here you can select the category of fiction you are looking for. Here you can select the non-fiction category you are looking for. If you go here you find poetry If you go here you find crime and suspense books.
If you go here you will find the Babylonians. If you go here then you will find the Bundlet. If you go here you will find essays. If you go here you will find books on fiction If you go here you will find the yellow library If you go here then you will find domestic fiction books. If you go here you will find the Like Library If you go here you will find the Otava Library. If you go here you will find audiobooks.
If you go here you will find Ukraine and Russia books. If you go here then you will find movie and theater books. If you go here then you will find biography books. If you go here you will find children\'s books. If you go here you will find Children\'s Nonfiction. If you go here you will find children\'s books for 0–3 year olds. If you go here you will find children\'s books for 4–6 year olds. If you go here you will find children\'s books for 7–9 year olds. If you go here you will find children\'s books for 10–12 year olds. If you go here you will find Maisa children\'s books. If you go here you will find books for young people. If you go here you will find children’s learning books. If you go here then you will find children\'s Pipsa Possu books. If you go here you will find something to do for the kids. If you go here you will find books related to children\'s emotional skills.
If you go here then you will find Crime novels, in English. If you go here then you will find new criminal books. If you go here then you will find Crime pockets. If you go here you will find Crime novel. If you go here you will find TV series.
If you go here you will find True Crime books. If you go here you will find comics. If you go here you will find paperback Here you can select the desired children\'s literature category. If you go here you will find books in English.
Here you can select the top category or topic you want.
